branchCategory.name: MHC2, Air Gripper, Angular Style
branchCategory.description: <p>Grippers with angular finger opening from 30&deg; to -10&deg; make&nbsp;the MHC2 suitable for workpieces of odd shapes and where space is too tight to accommodate a parallel type gripper.</p>
